Name: Aged Honey Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Rich, flavoursome honey replaces sugar syrup in this delicious Daiquiri. The fuller the honey, perhaps the bigger the rum.
History: Dedicated Daiquiri cocktail information, including variants, history and best recipes is available in our Daiquiri cocktail area.
Nutrition: One serving of Aged Honey Daiquiri contains 209 calories
